name: Fearfight (noaah1010)
description:
The Fearfighter need to control her fears and anxiety by defeating the dark sides of her thoughts. Travel the inner world of thoughts of the Fearfighter, discover your streanth and fight!

A game by Noa Aharon

Developed by Asaf Sharaby

Animation assistace by Matan Dadon and Keren Kobaivanov

Sound by Hed Gilboa
